charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1)(A)(iii); NARCOTICS-SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE; Unlawful Possession with Intent to Distribute 50 Grams or More of Cocaine Base. (1r)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant sentenced to One Hundred and Eighty Eight (188) months incarceration; followed by Five (5) years supervised release; special assessment of $100.00 imposed. (1r)

charges.charge_description: 18:922(g)(1); UNLAWFUL TRANSPORT OF FIREARMS, ETC.; Unlawful Possession of a Firearm by a Convicted Felon. (2r)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant sentenced to One Hundred and Twenty (120) months incarceration; to run concurrently with the sentence imposed on count 1r; special assessment of $100.00 imposed. (2r)

charges.charge_description: 18:922(g)(1); UNLAWFUL TRANSPORT OF FIREARMS, ETC.; Unlawful Possession of a Firearm by a convicted Felon. (3r)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant sentenced to One Hundred and Twenty (120) months incarceration; to run concurrently with the sentenced imposed on count 1r; special assessment of $100.00 imposed. (3r)

charges.charge_description: COMPLAINT filed in violation of 21 &; 18:841(a)(1) and 922(g) [1:96-m-708]
